bibl.title: Cleopatra. The Last Pharaoh. (Life & Times from Haus.)
bibl.note: Preface. - The Ptolemies of Egypt. - The Young Cleopatra. - Caesar and Cleopatra in Alexandria. - Cleopatra in Rome. - Antony and Cleopatra in Tarsus. - The Inimitable Life. - Fulvia and Octavia. - The Donations of Alexandria. - The War of Words. - Actium. - Inseparable in Death. - The Fate of Egypt.
bibl.seg: JONES Prudence J., Cleopatra. The Last Pharaoh. (Life & Times from Haus.)
London, Haus Publishinhg, 2006, 8°, x-159 pp., figg. n./bl. et coul., 1 carte. ISBN 978-1-904950-25-7. £7.99.

Preface. - The Ptolemies of Egypt. - The Young Cleopatra. - Caesar and Cleopatra in Alexandria. - Cleopatra in Rome. - Antony and Cleopatra in Tarsus. - The Inimitable Life. - Fulvia and Octavia. - The Donations of Alexandria. - The War of Words. - Actium. - Inseparable in Death. - The Fate of Egypt.
